Nightlight/Trinity:

Nighlight noticed that shields was down and she left the base, she 
looked that Lynzix ran towards the base with Trinity in arms, 
Nightlight had te bad feeling that somthing bad happened, but she 
knew that Trinity was safe and ran towards the battlefield. 


Trinity moaned weakly while she was in stasis.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: I'm assuming that Lynxiz can still get into the base. 
> Otherwise... bah! =P
> 
> --- Lynxiz ---
> 
> Lynxiz runs past the momentarily downed shields, and heads for 
> the entrance to the Chivitron base, Trinity in her arms.
